reviewText: Do you like h'n's games, but without hours of grinding? Then this one is for you!\nNice gameplay, simple story and hours of killing and slashing!!

reviewText:
Cool game in cartoon climat
- pixel graphics( me gusta)
- intuitive combat system
- small price
- seemingly simple but insanely addictive
Perfect for long nights time

reviewText:
An interesting game!

This is not a graphic style that convinced me, but I decided to play.
Incredible, I really have a fun! I'll leave It on my computer! The beginnings are difficult, but time is getting better! Prepare a dragon, I'm going after you! :D

reviewText: The game from the beginning seemed to be a good game and finally it is.\nThe game is really worth the price. Proper graphics to the game style, a lot of player skills, nice sounds\nand a lot of fun :D
